mapper.insert:
insert into goods values(null, #{code}, #{name}, #{manufacture}, #{price}, #{description}, #{rateSale}, #{categoryNo}, #{statusNo})
select last_insert_id()
mapper.select: select goods.no, code, goods.name as gname, manufacture, price, rate_sale as rateSale, category.name as cname, status.name as sname, c.iconStr from goods inner join category on goods.category_no = category.no inner join status on goods.status_no = status.no left join (select goods_no, group_concat(icon.name) as iconStr from goods_icon inner join icon on goods_icon.icon_no = icon.no group by goods_no) as c on goods.no = c.goods_no
